attributes.action: Government officials should be awake and not on mobile devices in parliament
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is on most social networks or news outlets that government officials are sleeping or on their phone or other things that may distract them from actually doing what they are in parliament for should this be ignored then I boycott voting Trent will be attempted until this matter is rectified and it will be made aware that precious petitions to sack officials sleeping was turned down so the government obviously does not care who represents it
attributes.background: I work hard every day my tax money pays for officials when they are in parliament I expect them to be able to be able to actually discus any issues that we may have!
